name: Dungeons & Vending
description:
You have are debt of 10,000 Gold to Mr Eric. He is known for not being very nice to people who don't pay their debts. Survive the dungeons, salvage what you can, craft items to sell. Sell! Sell! Sell!!!!

Controls

W- Move forward
S - Move backward
A,D - Turn left/right
E - Pick up materials
Space - Attack
Q - Use Scroll to increase max hp
H - Use Potion to heal
